questions.ques: Q 1 - Which of the following is true about variable naming conventions in JavaScript?
questions.answer1: A - You should not use any of the JavaScript reserved keyword as variable name.
questions.answer2: B - JavaScript variable names should not start with a numeral (0-9).

questions.ques: Q 2 - How can you get the total number of arguments passed to a function?
Q 3 - Which built-in method returns the length of the string?

Q 5 - Which of the following function of String object returns a number indicating the Unicode value of the character at the given index?
Q 6 - Which of the following function of String object returns the characters in a string between two indexes into the string?
Q 7 - Which of the following function of String object returns the calling string value converted to lower case?
